mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSC0043M ( REQST_ID, REQST_NO, REQST_CTGRY, REQST_CTGRY_SUB, REQST_ORD_ID, REQST_REF_DT, REQST_MEM_ID, REQST_CNTNT, REQST_ATTACH, REQST_OR_TYPE_ID, REQST_REM, REQST_STUS_ID, REQST_CRT_DT, REQST_CRT_USER_ID, REQST_UPD_DT, REQST_UPD_USER_ID, REQST_ACTN_ID, REQST_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ) VALUES ( MSC0043M_REQST_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{guardianNo} , #{guardianCaseCategory}, #{guardianSubCaseCategory}, #{orderId}, TO_DATE(#{complaintDate},'dd-mm-yyyy') , #{memberId}, #{complaintRemark}, #{hidFileName} , #{memTypeId}, null, '1', SYSDATE, #{reqstCrtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{reqstUpdUserId}, #{ActionId}, #{groupId} )
mapper.select: SELECT SYS.USER_MOBILE_NO, SYS.USER_FULL_NAME FROM SAL0001D SAL, SYS0047M SYS WHERE 1=1 AND SAL.CUST_ID = SYS.USER_ID AND SAL.SALES_ORD_NO = #{salesOrdNo} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DISTINCT Extent1.REQST_ID REQST_ID, Extent1.REQST_NO REQST_NO, Extent1.REQST_CTGRY REQST_CTGRY, Extent6.RESN_DESC RESN_DESC, Extent1.REQST_CTGRY_SUB REQST_CTGRY_SUB, Extent7.RESN_DESC RESN_DESC1, Extent1.REQST_ORD_ID REQST_ORD_ID, Extent2.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO, TO_CHAR(Extent1.REQST_REF_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') REQST_REF_DT, Extent1.REQST_MEM_ID REQST_MEM_ID, Extent5.MEM_CODE MEM_CODE, Extent5.NAME MEM_NAME, Extent1.REQST_CNTNT REQST_CNTNT, Extent1.REQST_ATTACH REQST_ATTACH, Extent1.REQST_OR_TYPE_ID REQST_OR_TYPE_ID, Extent4.TEL_M1 TEL_M1, Extent3.NAME CUST_NAME, Extent1.REQST_STUS_ID REQST_STUS_ID, Extent8.NAME NAME, TO_CHAR(Extent1.REQST_CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') REQST_CRT_DT, Extent1.REQST_CRT_USER_ID REQST_CRT_USER_ID, Extent9.USER_NAME USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(Extent1.REQST_UPD_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') REQST_UPD_DT, Extent1.REQST_UPD_USER_ID REQST_UPD_USER_ID, Extent10.USER_NAME USER_NAME1, Extent1.REQST_ACTN_ID REQST_ACTN_ID, Extent1.REQST_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID REQST_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, Extent11.CMPLNC_PERSON_IN_CHRG PERSON_IN_CHRG, Extent11.MEM_CODE || ' / ' || Extent11.NAME AS PERSON_IN_CHRG_NAME, Extent1.ACTION, Extent1.EYE_REWARD, Extent12.HR_CODE APPROVAL_CODE, NVL(Extent12.USER_FULL_NAME , ' - ') APPROVAL_NAME, NVL(Extent13.NAME , ' - ') APPROVAL_STATUS, TO_CHAR(Extent1.APPROVAL_DATETIME, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as APPROVAL_DATETIME
FROM MSC0043M Extent1 LEFT JOIN SAL0001D Extent2 ON Extent2.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.REQST_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0029D Extent3 ON Extent3.CUST_ID = Extent2.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0027D Extent4 ON Extent4.CUST_CNTC_ID = Extent2.CUST_CNT_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D Extent5 ON Extent5.MEM_ID = Extent1.REQST_MEM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0032M Extent6 ON Extent6.RESN_ID = Extent1.REQST_CTGRY LEFT JOIN SYS0032M Extent7 ON Extent7.RESN_ID = Extent1.REQST_CTGRY_SUB LEFT JOIN SYS0038M Extent8 ON Extent8.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.REQST_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent9 ON Extent9.USER_ID = Extent1.REQST_CRT_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent10 ON Extent10.USER_ID = Extent1.REQST_UPD_USER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.CMPLNC_ID, A.CMPLNC_NO, A.MEM_ID, B.CMPLNC_SO_ID, D.USER_ID PIC_USER_ID, C.CMPLNC_PERSON_IN_CHRG, E.NAME, E.MEM_CODE FROM MSC0005D A, MSC0006D B, MSC0007D C, SYS0047M D, ORG0001D E WHERE A.CMPLNC_ID = B.CMPLNC_ID AND A.CMPLNC_ID = C.CMPLNC_ID AND C.CMPLNC_PERSON_IN_CHRG = D.USER_ID AND D.HR_CODE = E.MEM_CODE ) Extent11 ON Extent1.REQST_MEM_ID = Extent11.MEM_ID AND Extent1.REQST_ORD_ID = Extent11.CMPLNC_SO_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent12 ON Extent12.USER_ID = Extent1.APPROVAL_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M Extent13 ON Extent13.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.APPROVAL_STUS_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND Extent1.REQST_ID = #{reqstId} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT Extent1.RESPNS_ID RESPNS_ID , Extent1.PAPARAZ_REQST_ID PAPARAZ_REQST_ID , Extent1.RESPNS_MSG RESPNS_MSG , Extent1.RESPNS_STUS_ID RESPNS_STUS_ID , Extent3.NAME NAME , Extent1.RESPNS_CREATOR RESPNS_CREATOR , Extent4.USER_NAME USER_NAME , TO_CHAR(Extent1.RESPNS_CREATED, 'DD/MM/YYYY') RESPNS_CREATED , Extent1.RESPNS_UPDATOR RESPNS_UPDATOR , Extent5.USER_NAME USER_NAME1 , TO_CHAR(Extent1.RESPNS_UPDATED, 'DD/MM/YYYY') RESPNS_UPDATED, Extent1.FILE_ID, Extent12.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, Extent13.ATCH_FILE_ID, Extent13.ATCH_FILE_NAME, Extent13.FILE_SUB_PATH, Extent13.PHYSICL_FILE_NAME, NVL(Extent14.NAME , ' - ') APPROVAL_STUS_ID, NVL(Extent15.USER_FULL_NAME , ' - ') APPROVAL_USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(Extent1.APPROVAL_DATETIME, 'DD/MM/YYYY') APPROVAL_DATETIME
FROM MSC0044M Extent1 LEFT JOIN MSC0043M Extent2 ON Extent2.REQST_ID = Extent1.PAPARAZ_REQST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M Extent3 ON Extent3.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.RESPNS_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent4 ON Extent4.USER_ID = Extent1.RESPNS_CREATOR LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent5 ON Extent5.USER_ID = Extent1.RESPNS_UPDATOR LEFT JOIN SYS0070M Extent12 ON Extent12.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = Extent1.FILE_ID and Extent1.FILE_ID != 0 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D Extent13 ON Extent13.ATCH_FILE_ID = Extent12.ATCH_FILE_ID and Extent1.FILE_ID != 0 LEFT JOIN SYS0038M Extent14 ON Extent14.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.APPROVAL_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent15 ON Extent15.USER_ID = Extent1.APPROVAL_USER_ID WHERE Extent1.PAPARAZ_REQST_ID = #{reqstId} order by Extent1.RESPNS_ID

SELECT Extent1.REQST_ID REQST_ID, Extent1.REQST_NO REQST_NO, Extent1.REQST_CTGRY REQST_CTGRY, Extent1.REQST_CTGRY_SUB REQST_CTGRY_SUB, Extent1.REQST_ORD_ID REQST_ORD_ID, Extent1.REQST_REF_DT, Extent1.REQST_MEM_ID REQST_MEM_ID, Extent1.REQST_CNTNT REQST_CNTNT, Extent1.REQST_ATTACH REQST_ATTACH, Extent1.REQST_OR_TYPE_ID REQST_OR_TYPE_ID, Extent1.REQST_STUS_ID REQST_STUS_ID, Extent1.REQST_CRT_DT, Extent1.REQST_CRT_USER_ID REQST_CRT_USER_ID, Extent1.REQST_UPD_DT, Extent1.REQST_UPD_USER_ID REQST_UPD_USER_ID, Extent1.REQST_ACTN_ID REQST_ACTN_ID FROM MSC0043M Extent1 WHERE Extent1.REQST_ID = #{reqstId} AND ROWNUM <= 1
mapper.update: UPDATE MSC0043M SET REQST_UPD_DT = sysdate, REQST_STUS_ID = #{guardianStatusId}, REQST_REM = #{guardianRemark}, REQST_CTGRY = #{guardianCaseCategory}, REQST_CTGRY_SUB = #{guardianCaseDetail}, REQST_UPD_USER_ID = #{guardianCreateBy}, REQST_MEM_ID = #{guardianpersonInvolvedId}, APPROVAL_USER_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM SYS0047M WHERE HR_CODE = #{guardianApprovalCode}), APPROVAL_STUS_ID = #{guardianApprovalStatusId}, ACTION = #{guardianAction}, EYE_REWARD = #{guardianEyeward} WHERE ( REQST_ID = #{reqstId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT T.APP_TYPE_CODE , T.APP_TYPE_NAME , T.CRT_USER_ID , T.CUST_IC , T.CUST_NAME , T.CUST_VA_NO , T.DSC_BRNCH_ID , T.KEYIN_BRNCH_ID , T.ORD_ID , T.ORD_NO , T.ORD_STUS_CODE , T.PO_NO , T.PRODUCT_CODE , T.PRODUCT_NAME , T.REF_NO , T.RENT_STUS , T.SALESMAN_MEM_ID , T.SALESMAN_CODE , T.SALESMAN_MEM_TYPE_ID , T.BILLING_GRP_ID , T.MAIL_TEL_MOB , T.MAIL_TEL_FAX , T.MAIL_TEL_OFF , T.MAIL_TEL_RES , T.INST_TEL_FAX , T.INST_TEL_MOB , T.INST_TEL_OFF , T.INST_TEL_RES , T.SIRIM_NO , T.SERIAL_NO , T.PROMO_CODE , T.PROMO_DESC , T.RELATED_NO , T.RELATED_ID , T.TEL_M1 , 1 C1 , NVL(T.APP_TYPE_ID, 0) AS APP_TYPE_ID , NVL(T.CUST_ID, 0) AS CUST_ID , TO_CHAR(T.ORD_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ORD_DT , NVL(T.ORD_STUS_ID, 0) AS ORD_STUS_ID , NVL(T.PRODUCT_ID, 0) AS PRODUCT_ID , T.PV_MONTH , T.PV_YEAR , NVL(COMBO_ORD_NO,'') AS COMBO_ORD_NO FROM ( SELECT /*+ use_nl( V1.som V1.ir V1.ie V1.ei V1.i V1.sod V1.cp3 V1.cp2 V1.rs V1.c V1.u V1.mem V1.cd V1.stk V1.pm V1.S ) */ V1.APP_TYPE_CODE , V1.APP_TYPE_ID , V1.APP_TYPE_NAME , V1.CRT_USER_ID , V1.CUST_IC , V1.CUST_NAME , V1.CUST_ID , V1.CUST_VA_NO , V1.DSC_BRNCH_ID , V1.KEYIN_BRNCH_ID , V1.ORD_DT , V1.ORD_ID , V1.ORD_NO , V1.ORD_STUS_CODE , V1.ORD_STUS_ID , V1.PO_NO , V1.PRODUCT_ID , V1.PRODUCT_CODE , V1.PRODUCT_NAME , V1.REF_NO , V1.RENT_STUS , V1.SALESMAN_MEM_ID , V1.SALESMAN_CODE , V1.SALESMAN_MEM_TYPE_ID , V1.BILLING_GRP_ID , V1.MAIL_TEL_MOB , V1.MAIL_TEL_FAX , V1.MAIL_TEL_OFF , V1.MAIL_TEL_RES , V1.INST_TEL_FAX , V1.INST_TEL_MOB , V1.INST_TEL_OFF , V1.INST_TEL_RES , V1.SIRIM_NO , V1.SERIAL_NO , V1.ITM_PRC_ID , V1.PV_MONTH , V1.PV_YEAR , V1.PROMO_CODE , V1.PROMO_DESC , V1.RELATED_NO , V1.RELATED_ID , CC.TEL_M1 , COMBO.SALES_ORD_NO COMBO_ORD_NO FROM SAL1013V V1 JOIN SAL0001D SOM ON SOM.SALES_ORD_ID = V1.ORD_ID JOIN SAL0027D CC ON CC.CUST_CNTC_ID = SOM.CUST_CNT_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D COMBO ON COMBO.PCKAGE_BINDING_NO = SOM.SALES_ORD_ID OR SOM.PCKAGE_BINDING_NO = COMBO.SALES_ORD_ID
WHERE 1 = 1
AND V1.SALES_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{ordStartDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{ordEndDt}||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND V1.SALES_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{ordDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{ordDt}||' 23:59:59', 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
AND V1.ORD_NO = #{ordNo}
AND V1.APP_TYPE_ID IN
#{item}
AND V1.ORD_STUS_ID IN
#{item}
AND V1.KEYIN_BRNCH_ID IN
#{item}
AND V1.DSC_BRNCH_ID IN
#{item}
AND V1.CUST_ID = #{custId}
AND UPPER(V1.CUST_NAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{custName})||'%'
AND UPPER(V1.CUST_IC) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{custIc})||'%'
AND V1.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
AND UPPER(V1.SALESMAN_CODE) = UPPER(#{salesmanCode})
AND V1.RENT_STUS IN
#{item}
AND UPPER(V1.REF_NO) = UPPER(#{refNo})
AND UPPER(V1.PO_NO) = UPPER(#{poNo})
AND #{contactNo} IN (V1.MAIL_TEL_MOB, V1.MAIL_TEL_OFF, V1.MAIL_TEL_RES)
AND UPPER(V1.CUST_VA_NO) = UPPER(#{vaNo})
AND UPPER(V1.SERIAL_NO) = UPPER(#{serialNo})
AND UPPER(V1.SIRIM_NO) = UPPER(#{sirimNo})
AND UPPER(V1.CRT_USER_ID) = UPPER(#{crtUserId})
AND UPPER(V1.PROMO_CODE) = UPPER(#{promoCode})
AND UPPER(V1.RELATED_NO) = UPPER(#{relatedNo})
AND V1.ORD_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT PO_ORD_ID FROM PAY0015D WHERE PO_REF_NO = #{invoicePoNo})
) T ORDER BY T.ORD_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE MSC0043M SET REQST_UPD_DT = sysdate, REQST_CNTNT = #{guardianRemark}, REQST_UPD_USER_ID = #{guardianCreateBy} WHERE ( REQST_ID = #{reqstId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT TT.CODE_ID , TT.CODE_NAME FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T.C1 , T.CODE_ID , T.CODE_NAME FROM ( SELECT 1 C1 , T1.RESN_ID CODE_ID , T1.CODE ||#{separator}|| T1.RESN_DESC AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0032M T1 WHERE T1.RESN_TYPE_ID = #{typeId} AND 1 = T1.STUS_CODE_ID
) T ) TT ORDER BY CODE_NAME

SELECT Extent1.DOC_NO_ID DOC_NO_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.DOC_NO ELSE '' END C1 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.DOC_NO_PREFIX IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.DOC_NO_PREFIX ELSE '' END C2 FROM SYS0082M Extent1 WHERE Extent1.DOC_NO_ID =#{docNoId} AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT T4.RESN_ID AS CODE_ID, T4.RESN_DESC AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0032M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0033M T2 ON T2.RESN_ID = T1.RESN_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0033M T3 ON T3.RESN_PARENT_GRP_ID = T2.RESN_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0032M T4 ON T4.RESN_ID = T3.RESN_ID WHERE T2.RESN_ID = #{CASE_CATEGORY}
mapper.update: UPDATE MSC0043M SET REQST_UPD_DT = sysdate, APPROVAL_STUS_ID = '5' WHERE ( REQST_ID = #{reqstId} )
UPDATE MSC0043M SET REQST_UPD_DT = sysdate, APPROVAL_STUS_ID = null, APPROVAL_USER_ID = null, REQST_STUS_ID = '60' WHERE ( REQST_ID = #{reqstId} )
